# AVMetadataHumanFullBodyObject

**Class**

An object that represents a detected human full body in a picture.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVMetadataHumanFullBodyObject
```

## Overview

On supported platforms, [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureMetadataOutput] outputs arrays of detected human full body objects.

## Bodies

- **AVMetadataBodyObject**: An abstract class that defines the interface for a metadata body object.
- **AVMetadataCatBodyObject**: An object representing a single detected cat body in a picture.
- **AVMetadataDogBodyObject**: An object representing a single detected dog body in a picture.
- **AVMetadataHumanBodyObject**: An object representing a single detected human body in a picture.

## Inherits From

- AVMetadataBodyObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
